projects.projectDescription:
Project Overview:
Clínica do Paião is a medical clinic located in Paião, Portugal, offering a range of medical services. This project involved building the entire website to provide an accessible and informative online presence for the clinic, enhancing its reach and patient engagement.

Responsibilities:
  • Website Development: Developed the entire website from scratch using React and Vite, focusing on creating a responsive and user-friendly interface.
  • Styling: Implemented styling using SCSS to ensure a clean and modern look that aligns with the clinic’s professional image.
  • Component Development: Created reusable and efficient React components for various parts of the website, such as service descriptions, contact information, and company details.
  • Version Control: Utilized Git for version control to manage and track changes throughout the development process.
  • Project Management: Used Scrum methodology to manage the project, ensuring timely delivery and iterative improvements.
  • Deployment: Deployed the website using GitHub Pages and set up a custom domain, including configuring DNS settings to ensure the site is accessible through a personalized web address.

Tools Used:
  • React and Vite: Utilized for building the user interface and managing the development and build processes.
  • SCSS: Employed for styling to create a modern and professional look.
  • Git: Used for version control and collaborative development.
  • Npm: Managed project dependencies and scripts.
  • GitHub Pages: Used for deploying the website and managing hosting.
  • DNS Configuration: Set up and configured the custom domain to ensure seamless access to the website.

Outcome:
The website for Clínica do Paião provides a seamless and informative online experience for patients, displaying comprehensive information about services, contact details, and company background. This project showcases my skills in modern web development, my ability to create functional and visually appealing websites, proficiency in managing projects using Scrum, and expertise in deploying websites with custom domains.

projects.projectDescription:
Project Overview:
This professional portfolio serves as a dynamic showcase of my current and future works, skills, and journey as a web developer. Designed and developed entirely from scratch, the portfolio highlights my expertise in both front-end and back-end development, as well as my design capabilities.

Responsibilities:
  • Full Stack Development: Developed the entire portfolio using React and Vite, ensuring a responsive and engaging user experience.
  • Database and API: Created a custom database using JSON and set up the API on GitHub Pages for dynamic content management.
  • Design: Crafted the complete design using Figma and Photoshop, including the layout, icons, and logo. Utilized SVGRepoFree for additional icons and created custom icons to enhance the visual appeal.
  • Styling: Implemented SCSS for modern and maintainable styling. Animations and Interactivity: Integrated AOS (Animate on Scroll) JS and Swiper JS to add smooth animations and interactive elements. Used Tooltip React for enhanced user interaction.
  • Code Quality: Used SonarLint to review and improve the code quality, ensuring clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
  • Version Control: Utilized Git for version control to manage and track changes throughout the development process.
  • Package Management: Managed dependencies and project configuration using npm to ensure a smooth development workflow.
  • Project Management: Managed tasks, bugs, updates, and errors using Jira Story, adhering to the Scrum methodology for efficient project management.
  • Deployment: Deployed the portfolio using GitHub Pages and set up a custom domain, including configuring DNS settings for a personalized web address.

Tools and Technologies Used:
  • Development and Deployment: React, Vite, JavaScript, GitHub Pages, JSON API.
  • Design and Styling: Figma, Photoshop, SCSS, SVGRepoFree, Custom Icons.
  • Interactivity and Animations: AOS JS, Swiper JS, Tooltip React.
  • Code Quality and Management: SonarLint, Git, npm, Jira, Scrum.

Main Purpose:
The primary goal of this portfolio is to showcase my skills, current projects, and future works as a web developer and UX/UI Designer. It provides potential clients and collaborators with a comprehensive view of my professional capabilities and serves as a testament to my expertise.

Outcome:
The professional portfolio effectively demonstrates my full stack development and design skills, featuring a dynamic, responsive, and visually appealing website. This project highlights my ability to manage a project end-to-end, from initial design through to deployment and maintenance, using a wide range of tools and technologies. It also serves as an ongoing platform to display my current and future works, solidifying my presence as a proficient web developer.
